overview:
Graham is the founder of I Love QC, he co-authored the first book on Quartz Composer for Pearson Education which was published summer 2012. Graham has been working the the field of interactive large scale projection for over 5 years.

I love QC was established to empower creatives to do more wonderful things. Quartz Composer a free apple tool, plugins into many industry standard packages to give them unique functionality. It requires not coding background but can allow artists to create 3d worlds that respond to music in just a few clicks. For those who don’t even fancy a few click we provide the files ready to go.

As the director of Shakinda Productions and as Video Jocket Shakinda, Graham has worked with a very large range of clients and spaces. From producing the animation for Land of Giants the largest outdoor arts event in Ireland where he and his pop up studio delivered over 6000 frames of hand drawn animation 4k animation, to working for MTV Arabia in Dubai to provide improvised visual performance alongside international Djs.

degrees.subject: Computer Science with Image and Multimedia
